description: Complete system overview documenting the core architecture, component relationships, and high-level feature map of the dating/social platform
Detailed documentation of privacy-related data models and algorithms, including group privacy settings, incognito mode, profile visibility controls, and tag visibility rules
Comprehensive documentation of group management algorithms, validation rules, capacity management, and member relationship models
Technical specification of location-based features including Travel Mode system, location-based discovery, and real-time tracking algorithms
Detailed documentation of content management systems including photo albums, video limitations, ephemeral messaging, and associated privacy controls
